title: 急急急，大佬们这个怎么解决，安装forge后出现的
author: whale3zzZ
txt_content:
[m[1;31m[00:09:37] [main/FATAL] [ne.mi.fm.lo.FMLLoader/CORE]: Access Transformer library is missing, we need this to run
[m[1;31m[00:09:37] [main/ERROR] [cp.mo.mo.TransformationServiceDecorator/MODLAUNCHER]: Service failed to load fml
[m[1;31m[00:09:37] [main/ERROR] [cp.mo.mo.TransformationServicesHandler/MODLAUNCHER]: Found 1 services that failed to load : [fml]

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
[1.14.4Forge]1.14.4forge整合包
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-898849-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

[1.15.2-1.7.10]能力整合-Forge/FabricAPI下的基础整合[持续更新]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)


这种情况还是建议直接用现成的比较好，
想纯一点的话直接下载完删除config和mods文件夹就行（不然自己弄挺麻烦的）

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
库丢失了，再重装下library试试
